title: Dr. Steven Gundry - Can Vegetables Be Unhealthy?, The Plant Paradox, Gluten or No Gluten?, & Diet
itunes:title: Dr. Steven Gundry - Are Vegetables Bad?, The Plant Paradox, Gluten or No Gluten?, & Diet
description:
#163: Dr. Steven Gundry is an author of the New York times best selling book the Plant Paradox, a cardiac surgeon and medical researcher. On this episode we discuss how our bacteria control our behavior and bodies, the plant paradox and how vegetables could be hurting us, gluten allergies, gut health, weight loss, and human optimization. We also dive into the evolution of the human diet.

To connect with Dr. Stephen Gundry click HERE

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE
